name: Powerful and Simple Property Responsive Listing plugin
author: Rajan V

sections.description:
Wp Smart Property plugin with smart admin control and Grid layout control. This plugin stores properties like a post so its not need any theme updation.

If any custom changes please contact us

Features

* Title
* Descriptions
* Featured Images
* No of Bedroom and Bathrooms
* Tags support
* Category support
* Near by and Away from options
* Search form widget
* Easy to modify
* Fully responsive and mobile ready.
* Unlimited grid anywhere.
* Query any post type.
* Query from multiple post type.
* Skin & Layout based.
* Pagination support.
* Custom number grid post per page.
* Social share buttons.
* Custom grid width.
* Custom grid thumbnail height.

And the great thanks and credits to the Post Grid
Plugin PickPlugins Team.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP version 5.2.17 or greater (recommended: PHP 5.4 or greater)
  • MySQL version 5.0.15 or greater (recommended: MySQL 5.5 or greater)

Installation

  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  • Add the property Grid and put the shortcode to where you want. copy shortcode from top of Post Grid Options [post_grid id=”GRID_ID”]
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Minimum Requirements

  • PHP version 5.2.17 or greater (recommended: PHP 5.4 or greater)
  • MySQL version 5.0.15 or greater (recommended: MySQL 5.5 or greater)

Installation

  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  • Add the property Grid and put the shortcode to where you want. copy shortcode from top of Post Grid Options [post_grid id=”GRID_ID”]

It required any perticular theme?

No, Its working on any themes

How i modify listing page?

You can create/change “archive-property.php”, If you are not developer please don’t do that.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • New: WP Smart Property search Widget

2.0

  • Update: Update custom Taxonomy codes
  • Add: Grid options
  • Update: All codes to OOPS
  • Remove: Property search Widget

upgrade_notice: The current version of WP Smart Property requires WordPress 3.0 or higher. If you use older version of WordPress, you need to upgrade WordPress first.
